_comment: This is a configuration file for the [Markdown link check](https://github.com/tcort/markdown-link-check).
All `/kyma-project` repositories in GitHub use [Markdown link check](https://github.com/tcort/markdown-link-check) to check their Markdown files for broken links.
Configuration and maintenance of the Markdown link check tool is the responsibility of a repository owner.
